abbot.util

Class Launcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • abbot.util.Launcher

  • public class Launcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Mail and browser launcher which augments Runtime.exec methods. Provides for built-in email and web browser support.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Launcher() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void mail(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String body)
      Format a message to the given user with the given subject and message body.
      static void mail(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String body, java.lang.String cc)
      Format a message to the given user with the given subject and message body, including a CC list.
      static void mail(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String body, java.lang.String cc, java.lang.String bcc)
      Format a message to the given user with the given subject and message body, including CC and BCC lists.
      static void open(java.lang.String target)
      Open the given target URL in the platform's browser.
      static void open(java.lang.String command, java.lang.String target)
      Use the given command/program to open the given target.
